languages.text: "И-и-и... Финальный ход, как у лучших игроков в регицид, шерин: находим рабочий когитатор и пускаем газ по трубам! Мне же не стоит напоминать, что все должно пройти в абсолютной тишине? Чтобы нас ни одна мышь не услышала? И уж тем более ребята Фалько".

traits.locale_text: "И-и-и... Финальный ход, как у лучших игроков в регизид, шерин: находим рабочий когитатор и пускаем газ по трубам! Мне же не стоит напоминать, что все должно пройти в абсолютной тишине? Чтобы нас ни одна мышь не услышала? И уж тем более ребята Фалько".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."
languages.original_text: "И-и-и... Финальный ход, как у лучших игроков в регицид, шерин: находим рабочий когитатор и пускаем газ по трубам! Мне же не стоит напоминать, что все должно пройти в абсолютной тишине? Чтобы нас ни одна мышь не услышала? И уж тем более ребята Фалько".

And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ええ、そして…最後の動きは、すべての最高のレジサイドプレイヤーと同じようにね、シャリーン。サービス考算機を見つけて、パイプに沿ってガスを送るのよ！そして、これをすべて完全に黙って行わなければならない、だなんて、もう念押しする必要はないわよね。ファルコの分はもちろん、下水のネズミでさえ私たちに気づかないはずよ」
languages.original_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、そして…最後の動きは、すべての最高のレジサイドプレイヤーと同じようにね、シャリーン。サービス考算機を見つけて、パイプに沿ってガスを送るのよ！そして、これをすべて完全に黙って行わなければならない、だなんて、もう念押しする必要はないわよね。ファルコの分はもちろん、下水のネズミでさえ私たちに気づかないはずよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “之后……就是最后一步，就像所有出色的弑君棋玩家那样，亲爱的。我们得找到伺服沉思者，把催眠气体送到管道里！这一切我们都得悄悄完成，这一点我应该不用再提醒你吧？就连下水道的老鼠都不能注意到我们，更不用提法尔科那帮人了。”
languages.original_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

traits.locale_text: “之后……就是最后一步，就像所有出色的弑君棋玩家那样，亲爱的。我们得找到伺服思考器，把催眠气体送到管道里！这一切我们都得悄悄完成，这一点我应该不用再提醒你吧？就连下水道的老鼠都不能注意到我们，更不用提法尔科那帮人了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Y... la jugada maestra, como dirían los regicidistas, shereen: ¡encontramos el cogitador de servicio y llenamos esas tuberías de gas! Huelga decir que todo esto lo haremos en el más estricto silencio. No nos pueden descubrir ni las ratas de las alcantarillas, ni mucho menos los secuaces de Falco».
languages.original_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

traits.locale_text: «Y... la jugada maestra, como dirían los regicidistas, shereen: ¡encontramos el cogitador de servicio y llenamos esas tuberías de gas! Huelga decir que todo esto lo haremos en el más estricto silencio. No nos pueden descubrir ni las ratas de las alcantarillas, ni mucho menos los secuaces de Falco».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Et en guise de coup de grâce... car comme pour tout joueur de régicide qui se respecte, il nous en faut un : on trouve le cogitateur de service et on libère le gaz dans le conduit ! J'imagine qu'il est inutile de vous rappeler que tout cela doit s'effectuer dans le silence le plus complet. On ne doit pas se faire repérer par un rat, et encore moins par un larbin de Falco. »
languages.original_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

traits.locale_text: « Et en guise de coup de grâce... car comme pour tout joueur de régicide qui se respecte, il nous en faut un : on trouve le cogitateur de service et on libère le gaz dans le conduit ! J'imagine qu'il est inutile de vous rappeler que tout cela doit s'effectuer dans le silence le plus complet. On ne doit pas se faire repérer par un rat, et encore moins par un larbin de Falco. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Uuund ... der letzte Zug, wie bei allen wirklich guten Königsmord-Spielern: Wir finden den Dienst-Cogitator und schicken das Gas durch die Rohre! Ich muss Euch sicher nicht daran erinnern, dass das alles völlig lautlos erfolgen muss? Nicht einmal die Kanalratten werden uns bemerken, und Falcos Leute schon gar nicht."
languages.original_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

traits.locale_text: "Uuund ... der letzte Zug, wie bei allen wirklich guten Königsmord-Spielern: Wir finden den Dienst-Cogitator und schicken das Gas durch die Rohre! Ich muss Euch sicher nicht daran erinnern, dass das alles völlig lautlos erfolgen muss? Nicht einmal die Kanalratten werden uns bemerken, und Falcos Leute schon gar nicht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Gelelim son hamlemize. Her usta kral katili oyuncusunun yapacağı gibi şirinim, biz de hizmet kavramsayarını bulup boruları gazla dolduracağız! Tüm bunları olabildiğince gizli yapmamız gerektiğini hatırlatmama gerek yoktur sanıyorum. Bırak Falco'nun adamlarını, lağım fareleri bile burada olduğumuzu bilmemeli."
languages.original_text: "Aaand... the final move, like all the best regicide players, shereen: we find the service cogitator and send the gas along the pipes! And I'm sure I don't have to remind you that we must do all of this in complete silence? Not even the sewer rats are going to notice us, let alone Falco's lot."

traits.locale_text: "Ve deee... Son hamlemiz. Her usta kral katili oyuncusunun yapacağı gibi şirinim, biz de hizmet kavramsayarını bulup boruları gazla dolduracağız! Tüm bunları olabildiğince gizli yapmamız gerektiğini hatırlatmama gerek yoktur sanıyorum. Bırak Falco'nun adamlarını, lağım fareleri bile burada olduğumuzu bilmemeli."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
